casebody.data:
Cincinnati Bar Association v. Shabazz.

[Cite as Cincinnati Bar Assn. v. Shabazz (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 535.]

(No. 94-553 Submitted May 10, 1994 Decided July 13, 1994.) *536Klaine, Wiley, Hoffman & Meurer and Franklin A Klaine, Jr.; Lindhorst & Driedame and James L. O’Connell, for relator. Donald A Shabazz, pro se. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendation of the board. Donald A. Shabazz is hereby suspended from the practice of law for an additional six months, to be served consecutively to his prior suspension, with the one year of monitored probation to follow. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
